name: Cyclotone III (o) (_fused)
description:
Sound → ON 

An ongoing audiovisual work [2012-2021]. Performed at Mutek, Elektra, Ars Electronica and Resonate, among others. 

'Paul Prudence’s work of flickering beauty, inspired by Russian cosmonauts, Constructivist-minded artists, and four-dimensional space cross-wires electroacoustic sound design and conceptual video material using only black, white and grey tones to deliver a deluge of mesmerizing, floor-to-ceiling, multi-modal synchronisations' – Mutek, 2017 

This version → Oct 2021. 

Artwork & Sound Design → Paul Prudence @MrPrudence
